title: Alternatives to Skopex
content:
Hello,

Can anyone recommend similar typefaces to PTL Skopex Serif?  
 [http://typecuts.com/fonts.php?kid=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20130715062624/http:/typecuts.com/fonts.php?kid=1 "http://typecuts.com/fonts.php?kid=1")

Basically, a modern serif with some interesting features, such as fancy ligatures, etc. Small caps, and both lining/non-lining numerals would be a bonus.

Thank you very much!

Max
author: maxack

comments.content: Many thanks SuperUltraFabulous , I have now decided on a typeface, Odile. Brilliant typeface.
Can you explain why Skopex doesn't work for you? That would help us make some useful recommendations.

I forgot about Odile (which I have). All the OpenType features are programmed very well into one font. Skopex—you have to buy different fonts for those important typographic options we appreciate.

Mikey :-)
